sentences.sentence: I watched the Bwana Beast episode ahead of time, too.
sentences.translation: 比斯特这一集我也提前看了。

sentences.sentence: "Bwana Beast was their friend," I said. "And now he's gone."
sentences.translation: “比斯特是他们的朋友，”我谨慎地答道，“而现在他死了。”

sentences.sentence: I have no idea what lesson the death of Bwana Beast taught him.
sentences.translation: 我不知道比斯特的死亡给了他什么教训。
